Ok, I had to switch keyboards, and this one's shift button works
funny, so my apologies if I have poor capitalization.

::Autofire/Zardus::

Autofire detects all the weaponfire coming at him and jumps, several
shots missing but alot of them smashing into his already damaged
armor, sending him down to the ground. He jumps up, firing a chaingun
at Starwind and one at Rattrap. He would not be taken down that
easily.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus watches the Maximals attack Autofire. He aims his energy
draining wrist missile launcher, firing two missiles at the
Decepticon.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., icedemon101@h... wrote:
> Starwind/Steel/Rattrap
> 
> 
> 
> Starwind turned around and fired his front three lazer cannons at 
> Autofire.
> 
> 
> Steel fired Two plasma shots. [just in case you all want to know 
> Steel is standing on top of Starwind.]
> 
> 
> 
> Rattrap jumped off next to Zardus and he fired 5 blast shots at 
> Autofire.
